fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may clean a player's house at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are immune to the Plague.
- Players who's house has been cleaned will have their will and role wiped on death. This is permanent.
- Players who's house has been cleaned will have their cause of death replaced with the following message:
> We could not find a role or last will, as the house had been cleaned thoroughly.
